headline: New Blog & Hiring Needs
description:
Well I failed badly in my mission to blog every week of 2017. I guess life and stuff just got in the way in the end. I&rsquo;ll try to be more consistent in the second half of 2018.
Anyway, I bring some news: I have a new blog engine, and we are hiring at Stack Overflow!
New blog engine I was previously using WordPress but had many issues and concerns with it.
